description: Provides the sending limits for the Amazon SES account. You can execute this operation no more than once per second.

nested_items.name: Max24HourSend
nested_items.description: The maximum number of emails the user is allowed to send in a 24-hour interval. A value of -1 signifies an unlimited quota.

nested_items.name: MaxSendRate
nested_items.description: The maximum number of emails that Amazon SES can accept from the user's account per second.

nested_items.name: SentLast24Hours
nested_items.description: The number of emails sent during the previous 24 hours.
